Issue.creator: skarim
Issue.summary: Refactor the fabric-ca-client CLI code to support integration tests
Issue.description: Refactor the fabric-ca-client CLI code to support integration tests. Currently all the CLI related code lives in the "main" package. However, it is desired that integration test be a self contained package. To be able to do this requires moving the "RunMain" function outside of the main package into a package of its own so that it can be referenced and integration package can call to it.
